name: galactic raft
description:
inspired by the works of a few games (namely Raft), i made a cool "survival" sandbox game abt being stranded in space

READ BELOW (very important)

this game is in early alpha, and many things are not yet implemented. for example you cannot die. whether you find a bug and want to let me know, or you just want to send me death threats, join this discord server. 

controls

WASD - move

TAB - open/close inventory

C - open/close crafting menu

SPACE - use (most) items

Q/E - rotate building preview

(experimental, let me know if these break)

[ (left bracket) - save game

] (right bracket) - load game

x - pick up building
